weekly picks (Feb 3 week 2023)

Posted on February 13, 2023 in 2023feb,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Feb 3rd week collection

  1. 2302.06645 Atomistic modeling of a superconductor-transition-metal dichalcogenide-superconductor Josephson junction (arXiv.org)

  2. 2302.06765 Singlet, Triplet and Pair Density Wave Superconductivity in the Doped Triangular-Lattice Moire System (arXiv.org)

  3. 2302.06823 Proximity-induced quasi-one-dimensional superconducting quantum anomalous Hall state: a promising scalable top-down approach towards localized Majorana modes (arXiv.org)

  4. 2302.07094 Andreev reflection in Euler materials (Euler materials, arXiv.org)

  5. 2302.07113 Pressure-tunable magnetic topological phases in magnetic topological insulator MnSb4Te7 (arXiv.org)

  6. 2302.06633 Fluctuation-dominated quantum oscillations in excitonic insulators (arXiv.org)

  7. 2302.06635 Hybrid Dyons, inverted Lorentz force and magnetic Nernst effect in quantum spin ice (arXiv.org)

  8. 2302.06642 Raman scattering study of multimagnon (bi- and tri-magnon) excitations and rotonlike points in the distorted triangular lattice antiferromagnet (arXiv.org)

  9. 2302.06964 Laser-induced topological spin switching in a 2D van der Waals magnet (arXiv.org)

  10. 2302.07007 Magnetic excitations in the topological semimetal $\mathrm{YbMnSb}_2$ (arXiv.org)

  11. 2302.07242 Spin wave Hamiltonian and anomalous scattering in NiPS$_3$ (NiPS3, arXiv.org)

  12. PhysRevLett.130.076203 Bottom-Up Growth of Monolayer Honeycomb SiC (PRL)

  13. PhysRevLett.130.076701 Dynamical Axions in $U(1)$ Quantum Spin Liquids (PRL)

  14. PhysRevLett.130.076801 Multiple Local Symmetries Result in a Common Average Polar Axis in High-Strain ${\mathrm{BiFeO}}_{3}$-Based Ceramics (PRL)

  15. PhysRevB.107.054104 Two-dimensional crystal phases of graphene monoxide (PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.107.054105 Exploring interacting topological insulator in the extended Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model (PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.107.054106 Comparative structural evolution under pressure of powder and single crystals of the layered antiferromagnet ${\mathrm{FePS}}_{3}$ (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.107.064418 Dimensionality-driven in-plane antiferromagnetism in two-dimensional ${\mathrm{SrRuO}}_{3}$ (SRO, PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.107.075134 Magnetic barrier and electric field effects on exciton-polaron relaxation and transport properties in transition metal dichalcogenide monolayers (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.107.075419 Charge quenching at defect states in transition metal dichalcogenide–graphene van der Waals heterobilayers (PRB)

  21. s17 How To Grow Silicon Carbide (Physics)

  22. 2302.05616 Evidence for three-dimensional Dirac semimetal state in strongly correlated organic quasi-two-dimensional material (arXiv.org)

  23. 2302.05625 Room Temperature d$^0$ Ferromagnetism in Carbon Doped LaH$_3$: Insights From Density Functional Theory Simulations (arXiv.org)

  24. 2302.05958 Ginzburg-Landau approximation for the Hubbard model in the external magnetic field (arXiv.org)

  25. 2302.06047 Orbital Gravito-Magnetoelectric response and Orbital magnetic quadrupole moment correction (arXiv.org)

  26. 2302.06222 Electric control of two-dimensional Van Hove singularity in oxide ultra-thin films (arXiv.org)

  27. 2302.06250 Signatures of many-body localization of quasiparticles in a flat band superconductor (arXiv.org)

  28. 2302.06324 Magnetic and electronic properties of Eu$_5$In$_2$Sb$_6$ (arXiv.org)

  29. 2302.06384 Mott-Insulator Ca2RuO4 under a static external electric field (arXiv.org)

  30. 2302.06211 Fermi surface nesting and surface topological superconductivity in $A$V${3}$Sb${5}$ (arXiv.org)

  31. 2302.06329 Guided vortex motion in a ferromagnet-superconductor bilayer (arXiv.org)

  32. 2302.06575 Superconducting diode effect in topological hybrid structures (arXiv.org)

  33. PhysRevB.107.064506 Impact of the orbital current order on the superconducting properties of the kagome superconductors (kagome, PRB)

  34. PhysRevB.107.075130 Fluctuation-induced first-order phase transitions in the Kitaev-like ${d}^{4}$ honeycomb magnet (kitaev, PRB)

  35. PhysRevB.107.075131 Spatial symmetry modulation of planar Hall effect in Weyl semimetals (planar, PRB)

  36. PhysRevB.107.075132 Shared universality of charged black holes and the complex large-$q$ Sachdev-Ye-Kitaev model (PRB)

  37. PhysRevB.107.075417 Anderson localization at the boundary of a two-dimensional topological superconductor (PRB)

  38. PhysRevB.107.085119 Effective medium model for graphene superlattices with electrostatic and magnetic vector potentials (PRB)

  39. PhysRevB.107.L081107 Quantum oscillations as a robust fingerprint of chiral anomaly in nonlinear response in Weyl semimetals (PRB)

  40. 2302.05078 Signatures of Chiral Superconductivity in Chiral Molecule Intercalated Tantalum Disulfide (TaS2, arXiv)

  41. 2302.05115 Unidirectional electron-phonon coupling as a fingerprint of the nematic state in a kagome superconductor (nematic, arXiv)

  42. 2302.05145 Discovery of Superconductivity in Van der Waals Ferromagnetic Sn$_{0.06}$Cr$_3$Te$_4$ (arXiv)

  43. 2302.05227 Charge Density Wave Order in Superconducting Topological Insulator Nbx-Bi2Se3 (arXiv)

  44. 2302.04877 Single monkey-saddle singularity at a two-dimensional Fermi surface and its instabilities (arXiv)

  45. 2302.05060 Chiral Fibonacci spin liquid in a $\mathbb{Z}_3$ Kitaev model (arXiv)

  46. 2302.05194 Non-Fermi liquid behavior of doped Kondo insulator: The unique properties of CeRhSb$_{1-x}$Te$_x$ (Ce, arXiv)

  47. 2302.05296 From linear to circular polarized light – Floquet engineering in Kitaev-Heisenberg materials with Lissajous figures (arXiv)
